summary:
As promised for @sappyblushy, here are our favorite british bois Dip and Pip -
💕Pastel pink edition💕
Or rather, as pastel pink...
body:
As promised for @sappyblushy, here are our favorite british bois Dip and Pip -

💕Pastel pink edition💕

Or rather, as pastel pink as I could make it 😅 As always, likes and reblogs are loved and appreciated 😘 (click for better quality) Make sure to follow me if ya like what ya see, and don’t be afraid to drop into my ask box if you guys have any suggestions for DnP drawings! (Or drawings in general. I’m not picky 😁) Love you all!

title: No More Hiding
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2AnxLUQ

by MaeTaurus

Dan and Phil are both tired of hiding and are finally ready to be more open with their viewers about their relationship. Phil surprises Dan with tickets to see London’s biggest fireworks display on New Year’s Eve, the first time they’ll be going out in public to celebrate the holiday. Phil has another surprise for Dan in a small, black box.

Words: 3934, Chapters: 1/1, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Phandom/The Fantastic Foursome (YouTube RPF)
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: No Archive Warnings Apply
  • Categories: M/M
  • Characters: Dan Howell, Phil Lester
  • Relationships: Dan Howell/Phil Lester, Dan Howell & Phil Lester
  • Additional Tags: Fluff, New Year’s Eve, Surprise Ending, Coming Out, Alcohol

blog.name: phanfeed-ao3
blog.title: Phanfiction!
blog.description:
!!! READ THE FAQ BEFORE SENDING ME AN ASK !!!

Mobile Links

This blog is autoposts anything that gets put in the Dan Howell/Phil Lester tag on Archive of Our Own (AO3).

Sometimes the applet on IFTT I use straight up breaks. I don't recommend turning on notifications for this blog. Links don't work on mobile.

Admin: Ozzy (foolishdeadbeat)

blog.name: dramaphan
blog.title: Yo I Comment On The Drama When Shit Hits The Fan
blog.description:
Phandom drama? It's more likely than you think.

.

My ask box is always open if you need a place to be dramatic, share theories, conspiracies, opinions, or general grievances. Fire away, my babies. Nothing is off limits. (Except for the things that are.)

.

Icon by phanniephobic, header by cinnamonnutlester
